formElement.label: Destination Directory
formElement.documentation: Directory where to copy the logs on the target system.

formElement.label: Server Resource
formElement.documentation: The name of the commander server resource to grab the logs from.

formElement.label: Target Server Resource
formElement.documentation: Name of the resource onto which to copy the logs.

formElement.label: Time
formElement.documentation: The time at which the issue happened (if known). Format is [yyyy-mm-dd] HH:mm.

formElement.label: Job Id
formElement.documentation: The jobId in which the issue occured (if known). It is used to retrieve the correct logs.
